divs: sighting detailsthis is no prank, ufo's are the same thing that appeared at fatima.... the same on that appeared over bush's home town, is the same one that i have been in contact with... allowing me to call on it, each night a gold orb *golden throne of the dead sea* looks like a golden tear drops appears and follows me each night, a ufo you may call it, but its the star of bethleham and the wise men... i am the al-mhaddi, the savior of all people of peace... and unless you want a full on invasion... haarp needs to shut down and george bush needs to step down and be charged as a being flown through space spiritually.. i am the completion of time and space itself... we all look for the same thing.... god.. and god, is alive, inside me, i am the first jewish temple, the first not happen, before the missles go to launch, they fail and your own country falls... haarp needs to stop with zapping the ozone, or fire and ice shall fall from the sky **no, not like babylon... this
